message.example: You are not authorized to create categories

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Invalid image format or size

items.example: The image must be a file of type: jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg.

get.description: Get a specific category by its ID

items.example: The field_id must be a valid integer.

message.example: You are not authorized to update this category

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this category

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this category
